channel.title: Welcome to Magical Clover Forum
channel.description:
Welcome to the Magical Clover Forum where hopes and dreams come alive!
This forum is for discussing topics related to [Spearmint](https://clover.moe/spearmint) and [Turtle Arena](https://clover.moe/turtlearena).
Clover, a character intended to appear in the game Extraordinary Beat X, is the invisible mascot and [white rabbit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White_Rabbit) of [ZTM's World of Wonder](http://clover.moe). Magical Clover is a magical girl spin-off version.
